dataset_id: NPP Tropical Forest: Pasoh, Malaysia, 1971-1973, R1
title: NPP Tropical Forest: Pasoh, Malaysia, 1971-1973, R1
summary: This data set contains four ASCII data files (.txt format), one providing net primary production (NPP) component data and three providing climate data. The NPP studies were conducted in a lowland tropical rainforest in the Pasoh Forest Reserve, Malaysia (2.98 N 102.31 E) from 1971 through 1973. Precipitation and temperature data are available from weather stations located about 25 km from the study sites.
